summary: A research expedition to the Arctic discovers that a melting polar ice cap has released a deadly prehistoric parasite.
cast: Val Kilmer|Martha MacIsaac|Kyle Schmid|William B. Davis|Steph Song|Anne Marie DeLuise|Viv Leacock|Peter Kelamis|Garry Chalk|John Callander|Lamech Kadloo|Sebastian Gacki|Alexandra Staseson|Aaron Ashmore|Alejandro Rae|Evan Adams|Brad Dryborough|Brenda Crichlow|Greg Rogers|Kurt Evans|Shawn Stone|Michaela Washburn|Michael Dobson|Lisa Marie Blair|Vanessa Morley|Zachary Throne
title: Deshielo
